entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
